inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry was performed revealing a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 63% of the predicted.

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential using contraception
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic respiratory disease or significant risk factor for cough or wheeze
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Respiratory tract infection within four weeks prior to visit 1
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He had these symptoms for 5 days during the past 2 weeks.

exclusion.criterion: Asthma diagnosis evidenced by UK quality outcome framework approved Read code and reversibility of ≥ 20% predicted
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Received oral, inhaled or systemic corticosteroids within four weeks prior to visit 1
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He doubled his oral corticosteroids in the past week.

exclusion.criterion: Significant chronic respiratory disorder other than asthma
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant medical condition that would make it unlikely for the patient to complete the study
exclusion.label: not_met
